events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case was reviewed and categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah K. for handling the refund process.
Hello! I’m Sarah and I’ll assist you today with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
Could you confirm if the item you received was opened or used in any way, so we can process the refund accordingly?
Thanks for your response. The item was unopened and still in its original packaging when I found out it was the wrong product.
We can issue a full refund once you return the unopened item. I will send you a prepaid return shipping label right away.
That sounds perfect, thank you. I appreciate the quick help and will send the item back tomorrow.
We have confirmed the returned item was received and processed your refund successfully. You should see the amount credited shortly.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with our service.
Since the refund was completed and no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support!
